Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary: This a really cool game but no cat, anyways the achievements are not that hard and the story is really cool also the graphics are up to my standards.

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary:
Got it on discount for around 2 bucks, its nothing special but when you find out there is only one person that developed this in his spare time it gets you thinking.
Its polished and well done overall but ultimately it brings nothing new to the "half likes" genre.
I would like to think i helped the guy that did this and one day he will get a job somewhere because he has experience as a developer under his belt.

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary:
I bought this game after playing through the first Estranged, a HL2 Mod. The first installment is called Estranged: Act I and is also available on steam - for free! My recommendation is to do the same, as they are directly linked. 

I wholeheartedly enjoyed this game due to the beautiful, fitting and diverse environments, the great slow-burn story telling and great production quality. This game is very much story based and not an arcade shooter, you will find yourself immersed but not jumping from massive action to massive action. Its suspenseful and sometimes scary, but not a horror game (which I am very thankful for). It can be poetic at times, in a calm non cringe worthy manner. The game isn't very long, but I think the length fits very well to the amount of story told and it easily justifies the very low price.


This is clearly a labor of love! Buy it! I can't wait for the next installment.

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary: Beautiful well-crafted indie game with great atmosphere and music, pretty good voice-acting, deep immersion. Much respect to the solo developer. Looking forward to your next Estranged-game!

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary: I loved act 1 and I loved the departure too, my only problem with the departure is that a lot of the time the game can give unity asset flip vibes, especially late game with the enemies and weapon models. Its definitely only a minor gripe, the games atmosphere, gameplay and story are absolutely fantastic

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary:
One of the best zombie-setting games I have played recently, the story plays out smoothly and tragically at the end when John wonders around the corner as a Rotter.

Some things did bug me though like "Why does a biohazard rotter take more bullets than a regular one?" or "How does a rotter drown?" The game itself was still fun to play.

TextSummary: why is this game so cheap

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary: Game with extremely good story. One of the best things were perfect soundtracks to every scenes !

Title: Not Recommended 👎
TextSummary:
It's clear that the developer only really planned out the mod and the first act of this game because everything else seemed rushed as hell or just poorly implemented; the story goes nowhere, the combat is way too easy, and the visuals remind me of a business email in how lifeless they look.

I do not recommend this game to anyone.

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary: Very good Game!

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary:
★★★☆☆ Good!

[h1]Survival[/h1]

The game continues after the events of Estranged: Act I. The majority of your time with Estranged: The Departure will be spend solving puzzles and exploring the game’s world. It packs in a great deal of atmosphere which sets the tone wonderfully, and makes spending time as you try to figure out the puzzles more enjoyable

In the game you play as a fisherman who has found himself stranded on an island shrouded in mystery. As you explore the island, with nothing but a flashlight in hand, you’ll uncover the secrets of the Arque Corporation.

Estranged: The Departure‘s beautiful visuals and intriguing story make it well worth a playthrough for those that crave a new adventure.

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary: This game is a 10/10. Even tough the ending is kinda sad (if i saw it correctly whats happening there). This game has more realism in the topic; grafic, voice acting, ambiance than most other games. its also really, really great. I finished this game now in 2 hours without wanting to achieve  every achievment but still. I think you NEED and SHOULD buy this, you dont even have to play the first part if u dont want to. Also if u buy it now (27.11.2022 on sale) you only pay 1,24€. or the normal price 4,99€. I have so much hope for the third part and I hope it soon comes into the Shop to buy (rn its in early access and I only want to play the full version so I dont get spoilerd). Also, i have never seen that the Game says thank you (your account name) it's such a great thing for me If someone says thank you.. IDK why. Did i mention how much I like this game? ye, buy it

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary:
6/10

ok I get it, that its made by only one person but there is so much room for impovement.

1. so little npc encounter, i literally killed only 2 enemies with the smg. why not add more enemy encounter and gunplay

2. biggest pack of zombies i saw had 3 zombies. why. the zombies walk in a straight line, u just shoot them in the head. i have 100 bullets in my gun and never had to use more than 5 at a time and there was always ammo lying around. if u need more work to improve zombie ai, increase the number. have 15-20zombies running at you. that way you make it more intense and interesting.

3. the puzzles were a joke. i literally had to be 1 month old to not get them.

4. no horror element. best i had was a light bulb turning off suddenly

5. the maps were so bad. every building was just a couple of floors with generic green/red colored wall with a bunch of stairs. at least try to make it interesting.

overall it felt more like i was just watching a youtube video rather than playing a game. one time i was distracted and even was pressing the space button to "pause the video"

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary:
The game is great.

The good side of moving out of source is the graphics is astronomically better but the gunplay is a bit janky, if it was in source it would at least decent.

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary: Mostly you'll just be carrying around a bucket, opening doors, finding tape recorders, shooting security cameras and emptying vending machines. While there are 2 types of enemies and some turrets you need to avoid, there's very little danger. Without being mean I'd say it's nice to support the developer for making both entries, especially when the first was free.

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary: Amazing game, left me wanting more.

Title: Recommended 👍
TextSummary: Finally gave it a whirl after doing my 100% playthrough of ACT I. Retains, and improves upon the gameplay and atmosphere of the original Source mod while being built on the Unreal Engine, something I'm sure was no easy task. Well done Alan. Hope we can see more from you in the future. Sorry it took me this long to actually play the darn thing...
